title: (x) A rounded serif to indentify (Which awards) - Ginkgo {Mike Y}
content:
I need some help to identify this rounded serif. Thanks

André

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110516205109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Awards_4801.png)
author: sim

comments.content:
I think that's Fedra, but I'll check.

- Mike Yanega

NOT Fedra (wrong W). Still searching...

- Mike Yanega

I think it's Linotype [Gingko Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20110516205109/http:/www.linotype.com/304441/ginkgobold-font.html).

- Mike Yanega

I guess I misspelled that -- it's Ginkgo. Nice new font.

- Mike Yanega

Great Mike! How could you be so fast and efficient? Many thanks :^)

You're right, nice font.

André

Glad to help.

My secret is the [Serif Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20110516205109/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/SerifGuide/intro.php). It is the newest of my Guides and it works pretty well when you learn how to use it.

- Mike Yanega
